ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - duel info needed
ygData.msgSnippet: I hope you re still alive to read this. ;) I thought that since she was sitting down to Meditate, the skelly would automatically aggro her?  When I ve been
ygData.messageBody:
I hope you're still alive to read this. ;)

I thought that since she was sitting down to Meditate, the skelly would
automatically aggro her? When I've been memorising songs in a newbie area,
the greenest of the greens will still attack me because I'm sitting down.

Sorry I don't have anything to add as a potential strategy.

Kyri


> >answer.
> >
> >My level 14 rogue is engaged in a virtual duel via email with a level 45
> >wizard. She's not out to kill me, just to get an item back. Currently
>I'm
> >immobilized and she's sitting a little ways in front of me medding.
> >
> >My thought was to shoot an arrow and a skeleton that just spawned behind
> >her, then evade and hope that it would attack the medding 45 wizard in
>it's
> >path before continuing on to me. (I want it to stun her so I can flee
> >before she gets another root off)
> >
> >What are the chances something like this would work in-game?
>
>
>Probably not, since in order for a monster to switch targets, it needs to
>have distance issues. If you can't move farther from the wizard, that
>skelly will just ignore her and move on to you.
>
>FYI 14 vs 45 - just give her the darn thing back.
>
>Talies
>
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
>
>
>
>
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
lol@... with the subject submissions.
